forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8am and 2pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
